name: K*A*O*R*I
description:
"inspiration"

In K*A*O*R*I you are Souji, the writer for an art magazine unable to keep up with the mysterious Ghostwriter who publishes articles under your name. Can the Ghostwriter resolve your past?.

This title is an original ATP Projects release, published 2004-11-14. The writing, production and direction was done by mikey. The art was done by Kathryn. The engine was created by Jet. Estimated completion time is 30 minutes.

K*A*O*R*I is game Nr. 21 of the Original 22.
